Reviews.Title: “The hotel itself was fine, but if we had a do-over, we'd pick something closer to the center of Rome”
Reviews.Author: Danielle D
Reviews.Content: wouldnt call fourstar hotel nice clean quiet enjoyed stay people front desk nice accommodating night bartenders friendly helpful bathroom set vanity separate bathtoilet found location action convenient trip busmetro confusing found easier rent scooter own schedule breakfast delicious tons options eat otherwise starving time romes center overall disliked location getting wifi ridiculously expensive hotel inexpensive options immediate otherwise hotel price

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but beware the hidden fees...”
Reviews.Author: ladylovesrome
Reviews.Content: stayed eur suite happy overall spacious nice bathroom lots closet space refrigerator tv seperate living breakfast plain croissants versus ones icing smokefree balcony staff accomodating downsides cant control temperature add 18 euro fee person trip prepaid 18 euro nearly double plus whatever credit card charges wasnt happy location pretty fortunately train station bus dont walk nearby restaurants arent catch bus towards train station cool kebab gelatto favorites theres grocery store train station stock water fruit fridge
